about_the_game:
This free demo contains the Introduction and Chapter 1 of the full visual novel. The rest of Clash: Blue Mirage is currently in production. Wishlist and follow the game for updates!

It was a rare snowy night. Clash invited the two most important humans in his life out for a Christmas concert. Instead, they stumbled into a case of robot assault! What would cause such a thing? And who was that strange child in the alley?

Also contains a flashback to the first game, wherein you - the player! - can pick key events from that game to influence this one.



  • Demo for the full fledged sequel to Clash: Robot Detective - Complete Edition
  • Take on the role of Clash's assistant once again
  • Get caught up via flashback!
  • Experience a Christmastime crime!
  • Visuals cobbled together in curious collages!
  • One in-game achievement!
  • Speech checks!
